name: ubco-print-farm
author: Andre Cox
description: The client app for viewing information from the print farm

scripts.dev:desktop: concurrently -k true -n "Tauri Process, Next Server" "yarn tauri dev" "yarn dev:no-open"
scripts.build:mobile: next build && next export && cap sync
scripts.build:desktop: next build && next export && tauri build
scripts.android: yarn build && next export && cap run android
scripts.ios: yarn build && next export && cap run ios
